recordTypes.name: Dog License
recordTypes.description: Apply for a dog license from the Town of Coventry

recordTypes.name: Building Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a building permit from the Town of Coventry, and (if applicable) apply for a related Fire Plan Review

recordTypes.name: Zoning Board of Review Application
recordTypes.description: Application to the Zoning Board of Review for consideration of request for Dimensional Variance, Use Variance, Modification to be Granted by Zoning Officer, and Extension Request.

recordTypes.name: NEW Life Safety Inspection
recordTypes.description: Click here to submit your request for an inspection from the local Fire Marshal (related to business licenses or construction rough/final)

recordTypes.name: Mechanical Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a mechanical permit from the Town of Coventry, and (if applicable) apply for a related Fire Plan Review from the Fire Marshal.

recordTypes.name: Electrical Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for an electrical permit from the Town of Coventry, and (if applicable) apply for a related Fire Plan Review from the Fire Marshal.

recordTypes.name: Plumbing Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a plumbing permit from the Town of Coventry, and (if applicable) apply for a related Fire Plan Review from the Fire Marshal.

recordTypes.name: Well Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a Well  permit from the Town of Coventry.

recordTypes.name: Water Filtration Permit Residential
recordTypes.description: Apply for a Water Filtration permit from the Town of Coventry.

recordTypes.name: Demolition Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a demolition permit from the Town of Coventry.

recordTypes.name: Solar Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a solar permit from the Town of Coventry.

categories.name: Town Clerk
categories.content:
Apply for dog license here.

Additional services coming soon.

categories.name: Building Department
categories.content: Submit one form to apply for permits (including Fire Plan Review, if applicable).

categories.name: Fire Marshal
categories.content: Fire Districts and Property Information - The fire district for each property is given on the property record card, along with the fire district collector’s phone number.  This district information is on the lower right with the land information.  Property record cards c
